BANNER_DATA.heading: Join the HearCog Professional Network
BANNER_DATA.description: HearCog links hearing-impaired patients with local, qualified professionals to ensure every individual receives comprehensive hearing evaluations.

VALUES_CARDS.title: Reach More Patients
VALUES_CARDS.description: Expand your practice by gaining access to more patients seeking reliable hearing care through HearCog's trusted platform.

VALUES_CARDS.title: Improve Access to Care
VALUES_CARDS.description: Help increase accessibility to quality hearing healthcare by connecting with patients in need of your specialized services.

VALUES_CARDS.title: Network Effect Value
VALUES_CARDS.description: Gain more exposure by joining a directory that connects you with patients through a network of verified professionals in your area.

VALUES_CARDS.title: Highlight Your Expertise
VALUES_CARDS.description: Showcase your qualifications and specialties to attract patients who need your specific expertise, helping them find a professional they can trust.

VALUES_CARDS.title: Be Part of a Trusted Directory
VALUES_CARDS.description: Be verified as a trusted healthcare provider. Your profile becomes part of a curated network of professionals committed to patient care and safety.

WHO_CAN_JOIN.title: Advanced hearing healthcare providers with verified credentials
